snippet: As expected, the Mets optioned Matz to the minor league camp after he gave up three hits in two and two-thirds innings against the Tigers on Saturday. He is expected to start the season at Class AAA Las Vegas.
abstract: New York Mets send pitcher Steven Matz to minors after giving up three hits against Detroit Tigers.
lead_paragraph: As expected, the Mets optioned Matz to the minor league camp after he gave up three hits in two and two-thirds innings against the Tigers on Saturday. He is expected to start the season at Class AAA Las Vegas.

headline.main: Mets Demote Steven Matz, a Top Prospect, After a Solid Outing
